mapping.sql: select t1.POST_ID, t1.POST_TITLE, t1.ISSUE_DATE ISSUE_DATE, t1.BEGIN_DATE BEGIN_DATE, t1.END_DATE END_DATE, (case t1.POST_STATE when 1 then '已发布' when 0 then '未发布' else '未 知' end) POST_STATE, t1.UPDATE_DATE UPDATE_DATE, t2.USER_NAME USER_ID from E_POST t1 left join E_USER t2 on t1.USER_ID=t2.user_id where 1=1 {and t1.post_title like '%'||#post_title#||'%'} {and t1.begin_date= #begin_date#} {and t1.end_date= #end_date#} {and t1.post_state=#post_state#} order by t1.issue_date desc
select POST_ID, POST_TITLE, ISSUE_DATE ISSUE_DATE, BEGIN_DATE BEGIN_DATE, END_DATE END_DATE, POST_STATE, POST_CONTENT, UPDATE_DATE, USER_ID from E_POST where post_id=#post_id#
delete E_POST where POST_ID = #postId#; delete E_POST_ROLE WHERE POST_ID=#postId#;

select t1.POST_ID, t1.POST_TITLE TITLE, t1.BEGIN_DATE BEGIN_DATE, t1.USER_ID, COALESCE(t2.USER_NAME, '<未知>') USER_NAME from E_post t1 left join E_user t2 on t1.user_id = t2.user_id where #date()# between begin_date and end_date and t1.post_state='1' and t1.post_id in (select a1.post_id from E_post_role a1, E_user_role a2 where a1.role_code = a2.role_code and a2.user_id = #session.UserInfo.USER_ID#) order by t1.issue_date desc

select t1.post_title TITLE, to_char(to_date(t1.begin_date,'yyyymmdd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') as "BEGIN_DATE", t1.post_content CC, t1.USER_ID, t2.USER_NAME from E_post t1 left join e_user t2 on(t1.user_id=t2.user_id) where t1.post_state='1' and t1.post_id = #post_id#

select t1.post_title TITLE, to_char(to_date(t1.begin_date,'yyyymmdd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') as "BEGIN_DATE", t1.post_content CC, t1.USER_ID, t2.USER_NAME from E_post t1 left join e_user t2 on(t1.user_id=t2.user_id) where t1.post_id = #post_id#
